SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTDEPO) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/cdep where CDEP_ADMNO in (:2) and CDEP_CLNTNO in (:3) and CDEP_TYPE<>5 and CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTDEPO<>0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
